context_of_use: This use case allows users to update and maintain their account profile information and preferences within the system.
stakeholders_and_interests: user: To maintain accurate account details
description: This use case enables users to update their profile information to ensure their account details remain accurate.
triggering_event: User initiates a request to update profile information.
preconditions: User is logged into the system.
postconditions: User's profile information is updated successfully.
User receives confirmation of the update.
assumptions: User has previously authenticated their account.
requirements_met: The system shall allow users to update their profile information.
The system shall authenticate users before allowing profile updates.
main_flow: 1. User requests to update profile information → System prompts for authentication.
2. User provides authentication credentials → System verifies credentials.
3. System confirms authentication → User submits updated profile information.
4. User submits updated profile information → System updates the profile and confirms the update.
